ygData.subject: RE: Don't go to Befallen at level 9!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Some times you need to yell it out! Some of us aren t bound to the outside, so if our keyholder gets toasted by some baddies, the only key the rest of us will
ygData.messageBody:
Some times you need to yell it out! Some of us aren't bound to the outside,
so if our keyholder gets toasted by some baddies, the only key the rest of
us will have is the key to 'Yer Screwed'-City!

A dying halfling is a desperate halfling.

-----Original Message-----
From: Ralph Carothers [mailto:CarothersR@...]
Sent: 1999/09/27 3:25 PM
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Don't go to Befallen at level 9!!!



eventually as you get higher in there...you'll hate one shout
though....especially doing where I've been recently ;) Elf skeles....(which
have changed in frequency btw- dread bones pop up there ALOT now)

That line: OPEN THE DOOR!

If its one thing I cant stand about befallen...it is that line. I bind
myself at the entrance, and then go through the first door, and drop through
a floor hole to get to elf skeles or whole 3rd lvl....and gate out to
opening when I need....i hate hearing: OPEN UP!!!!! Dont be an ass....open
the door man!

-----Original Message-----
From: Rob Berryhill [ mailto:racefan@...
<mailto:racefan@...> ]
Sent: Monday, September 27, 1999 3:36 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Don't go to Befallen at level 9!!!


From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>

I happen to agree with Mik. You can *easily* do the top floor of Befallen
and level 9 and get GREAT exp and loot.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro

> From: Kevin Dailey <Kevin_Dailey@...>
>
> Mikaela wrote:
>
> "Go to Befallen. It's a great place for a cleric your level [level 9].
> I spent levels
> 9 - 16 in Befallen in beta and had a blast."
>
>
> Saidinn Witchwood responds:
>
> *GASP*
>
> Go to Befallen as a level 9 cleric? HA HA HA HA HA HA HA!
>
> Oh my, that was a good one Mikaela. *shakes head in friendly disbelief*
> :)
> Saidinn Witchwood
>
> P.S. I know there are probably some of you out there who actually love
> Befallen, but PLEASE, can we at least agree that Wixl shouldn't go to
> Befallen until at least level 15?
